name: Block of duck foie gras with pieces
title: Labeyrie Le Raffiné · Block of duck foie gras with pieces · with slicer for easy cutting
description: Labeyrie Block of duck foie gras with pieces with slicer for easy cutting Enhanced by a touch of Armagnac

mainInformation.ingredients: Entenstopfleber 58 %, Entenstopfleberstücke 30 %, Nitritpökelsalz (Kochsalz, Konservierungsstoff: E 250),Weinbrand Armagnac, Gewürze, Zucker, Antioxidationsmittel: E 301.
mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

usageInformation.usage: Press the sides of the tray to remove the Foie Gras. Slice easily with the lyre. Serve as a starter with toasted bread and fig or onion confit or an apricot chutney.
usageInformation.additionalInformation: A plastic tray: easy to unmould, good preservation of the organoleptic qualities of the product. A lyre to make thin and homogeneous slices. Half moon slices for an original presentation. A 300g format for tasting with others. Labeyrie" ducks are raised in the open air in the South West of France; the farmers look after an average of 800 geese or 1500 ducks per farm on a total area of at least one hectare. Their feed consists of cereals, protein feed, vitamin and mineral supplements. No hormones are used. The duck complies with IGP (Protected Geographical Indication) standards and meets the following characteristics: reared in the South-West for a minimum of 81 days before force-feeding, force-feeding for a minimum of 12 days with 100% South-West corn.

otherInformation.legalDesignation: Entenstopfleber aus Sudwest-Frankreich mit 30% Stücken 190gr + Schneidfaden
